column1: Local Foods////Local Foods hits all the marks for me - great food
column3: and it's close to work!  The seasonal menu means you're getting the freshest
column4: most seasonal appropriate offerings and I haven't met one of their sides I don't like.  If you're ever stumped to make a decision when it's your turn at the cash register
column5: everyone I've encountered is eager to help offer their favorite dishes to help you narrow things down.   It can get crowded at lunch and a little difficult to grab a table
column6: but their bussers are quick to get things cleaned up for the next diners.  The portion sizes are great
